name: faff
content:

something that takes a lot of effort or causes slight problems: Stripping the walls was a real faff. Chopping all those onions is such a faff. We had the usual faff taking public transport. It's an awful faff to make your own marmalade. This shirt is a bit of a faff to iron. The food processor is too much of a faff to clean.
